name: Nature Espirit
description:
ENGLISH

You are a Plant seeking for the light it needs to grow, this light has been stolen by the plagues that habits the forest, you must defeat them and restore the order as you grow.

ESPAÑOL

Eres una planta que busca la luz que necesita para crecer, esta luz ha sido robaa por las plagas que habitan el bosque, debes vencerlas para poder conseguir la luz y restaurar el orden a medida que creces.
